name: Lost Signal (Robica121)
description:
*Fixed a bug where camera got stuck*

This is a game made for the Game Dev Cafe game jam.

The theme was Lost Signal

Controls : 
W,A,S,D - Movement
Shift - Run
Space - jump
Tab - Show current quest
E - Interact
Esc - Pause*

This is a game about a child that has an abusive father. You have to help your dad, before he get's angry.

* Pause isn't working as intended

**Please leave a comment about the feel of the game, controls, audio, lights, etc. And the overall fell.
